content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Coal (position x)

### Iron plate crafting area
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)
- Assembling machine (position y)
- Inserter (position z) that puts into the assembling machine

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough resources in your inventory to craft the required items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates. Make sure to smelt iron-plates in a furnace before attempting to craft.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
